hangle: 최근 황태자 전하께서 유흥가에 금화를 뿌리며 돌아다닌다는 걸 아시나요?
first_translate: do you know that his highness has been throwing gold coins around at entertainment districts recently?
well yes, I wish we didn’t have to find out about this,
but unfortunately, he was caught by house frisella’s information network.

hangle: 현대 사회로 따지면 술집에서 여자를 끼고 지폐를 뿌리는 사람이군.
first_translate: in modern terms,  he’d basically be splurging money on women at bars.

hangle: 한 방 먹일 준비는 다 되었답니다.
first_translate: everything is ready so that we can deal him one good blow.
my ears are going to fall off...

hangle: 경기 하나 끝났다고 저렇게 함성을 지르는 거야?
first_translate: is everyone screaming like that just because one match ended?
the guards are all stationed near the entrance now.
and apparently, today's main event will take place during the next match.

hangle: 오늘은 정말 여태껏 공개한 적 없는 마물을 소개하겠습니다!
first_translate: today, we shall introduce a monster never seen before!
a new species discovered from the land of death!

hangle: 흉폭한 게 딱 봐도 광폭화가 진행된 마물이에요.
first_translate: ...looks extremely violent. clearly, its madness has progressed quite far.
since there’s a barrier cast over us, we’ll probably be fine.

hangle: 방어 마법은 아마 곧 무너질 거예요.
first_translate: the defensive magic won’t last much longer though.

hangle: 경, 출입구에 인원 배치 다 끝났다고 했죠?
first_translate: kyeong, did you say that all our men were positioned at the entrance?
then let’s move forward with our plan sooner.
how could things turn out like this?!

hangle: 대체 어떤 놈이 이런 짓을 벌인 거지?!
first_translate: whoever dared do such a thing better watch their back once I catch them!
if I ever get my hands on them, I’m not letting go without making them pay.
there’s someone walking into the arena right now!
you cannot allow her to escape!
this whole mess was caused by that bastard after all.
do you think I'll sit idly while being taken advantage of?! no way!
I’ll personally set you free if...

hangle: 그 천한 사생아 새끼를 통째로 씹어 먹어 버리라고!
first_translate: ...and devour every bit of that wretched little bastard!
